menuItems.name: Cappuccino with Chocolate
menuItems.description: A cappuccino is an approximately 150 ml (5 oz) beverage, with 25 ml of espresso coffee and 85ml of fresh milk.

menuItems.name: Cappuccino with Oat Milk
menuItems.description: Enjoy our dairy-free version of the classic cappuccino made with creamy oat milk.

menuItems.name: Classic Latte
menuItems.description: Our classic latte is made with steamed milk and a shot of espresso, topped with a touch of foam.

menuItems.name: Americano
menuItems.description: An Americano is made with espresso and hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from traditionally brewed coffee.

orderDetails.deliveryAddress: Jl. Kpg Sutoyo No. 620, Blizen, Tanjungbalai
